alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson; McDonough; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:28AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...An area of strong winds will impact portions of southern Warren, southeastern Henderson, northern McDonough and northeastern Hancock Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 326 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong winds near Blandinsville, or 12 miles west of Macomb, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break tree limbs, knock down weak trees and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Bushnell, Colchester, La Harpe, Roseville, Blandinsville, Good Hope, Prairie City, Bardolph, Tennessee, Sciota, Western Illinois University, Little Swan Lake, New Philadelphia, Walnut Grove, Greenbush, Berwick, Fountain Green, Macomb Municipal Airport and Warren County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
